title: The impact of the Cold War on domestic affairs

content.question:
In what ways did Cold War foreign policy affect domestic affairs during TWO of the following presidencies?
Harry Truman, 1945–1953
Lyndon Johnson, 1963–1969
Ronald Reagan, 1981–1989

frqParts.text:
In what ways did Cold War foreign policy affect domestic affairs during TWO of the following presidencies?
Harry Truman, 1945–1953
Lyndon Johnson, 1963–1969
Ronald Reagan, 1981–1989

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
